content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-11.5, 26.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-18.0, -49.0) and a furnace at position (x, y) (exact position not specified in logs)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)

### Assembling machine factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing a new steam engine
- Ensure that the desired position for placing the steam engine is valid and not obstructed by other entities before attempting to place it.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions of the entities you are attempting to connect with pipes are within a valid range. Check for any obstacles that may prevent the connection.

### Errors when using existing entities
- Verify that existing entities such as the steam engine are properly connected to the power network and have the necessary input resources before attempting to use them.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for any existing entities that may occupy the desired tile.
